mapper.select: SELECT NVL(b.class_now_participation,-1) as class_now_participation FROM class a, (select count(case when MEMBER_TYPE=#{member_type} then '1' end) as class_now_participation from member where MEMBER_SEQ in(SELECT INCLASS_MEMBER_SEQ FROM inclass WHERE inclass_class_seq = #{class_seq})) b WHERE a.seq = #{class_seq} and b.class_now_participation(+) >= a.class_participation
SELECT count(INCLASS_CLASS_SEQ) FROM inclass WHERE INCLASS_MEMBER_SEQ = #{member_seq} and INCLASS_CLASS_SEQ = #{class_seq}

SELECT class_name FROM (select CLASS_TYPE,CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ,CLASS_NAME,REGDATE,SEQ,CLASS_TERMIN,CLASS_PARTICIPATION,CLASS_SD,CLASS_DEPA,CLASS_STARTTIME,CLASS_WEEK, CLASS_CD,CLASS_TIME from class where class_type in('W','C') and seq in(select inclass_class_seq from inclass where inclass_member_seq = #{class_member_seq} )) WHERE seq = #{seq} and CLASS_SD<=to_date(#{class_cd},'yyyy-mm-dd') and (CLASS_CD>=to_date(#{class_sd},'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (to_date(class_starttime, 'hh24mi') <= (to_date(#{class_starttime}, 'hh24mi')+#{class_time}/(24*60)) and ( to_date(class_starttime, 'hh24mi')+class_time/(24*60))>=(to_date(#{class_starttime}, 'hh24mi'))) and REGEXP_LIKE(CLASS_WEEK,#{class_week})

SELECT class_name FROM (select CLASS_TYPE,CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ,CLASS_NAME,REGDATE,SEQ,CLASS_TERMIN, CLASS_IMG,CLASS_DETAIL,CLASS_PARTICIPATION,CLASS_SD,CLASS_DEPA,CLASS_AREA,CLASS_STARTTIME,CLASS_WEEK, CLASS_CD,CLASS_HASHTAG,CLASS_PRICE,CLASS_TIME,CLASS_INFO from class where class_member_seq = #{class_member_seq} ) WHERE CLASS_SD<=to_date(#{class_cd},'yyyy-mm-dd') and (CLASS_CD>=to_date(#{class_sd},'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (to_date(class_starttime, 'hh24mi') <= (to_date(#{class_starttime}, 'hh24mi')+#{class_time}/(24*60)) and ( to_date(class_starttime, 'hh24mi')+class_time/(24*60))>=(to_date(#{class_starttime}, 'hh24mi'))) and REGEXP_LIKE(CLASS_WEEK,#{class_week})

SELECT a.class_type,a.seq, a.class_name,a.regdate, a.class_info, a.class_area, a.class_depa , a.class_sd , a.class_cd, a.class_week , a.class_starttime , a.class_time , a.class_price, a.class_PARTICIPATION, a.class_detail, a.class_img , a.class_hashtag, a.class_termin, NVL(b.rating,0) as rating, c.participation, c.d_day, d.MEMBER_NAME AS CLASS_CREATOR_NAME FROM (SELECT class_type, seq, class_name, regdate, class_info, class_area, class_depa , class_sd , class_cd, class_week , class_starttime , class_time , class_price, class_PARTICIPATION, class_detail, class_img , class_hashtag, class_termin,CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ FROM class WHERE seq in(SELECT INCLASS_CLASS_SEQ FROM INclass WHERE INCLASS_MEMBER_SEQ= #{member_seq})) a, (SELECT CLASS.CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ, ROUND(AVG(REVIEW.REVIEW_RATING),1) AS RATING FROM REVIEW, CLASS WHERE REVIEW.REVIEW_CLASS_SEQ = CLASS.SEQ GROUP BY CLASS.CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ) b, (SELECT seq, (SELECT COUNT(inclass.inclass_class_seq) FROM INCLASS WHERE INCLASS.INCLASS_CLASS_SEQ = CLASS.SEQ) AS participation, (TO_CHAR(CLASS.CLASS_SD,'YYYYMMDD')-TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) AS d_day FROM CLASS) c, (SELECT member_seq,MEMBER_NAME from member) d WHERE a.CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ = b.CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ (+) AND a.SEQ = c.SEQ and d.member_seq = a.CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM inclass WHERE inclass_member_seq = #{member_seq} AND inclass_class_seq = #{class_seq}
